sections.summary:
Administrative Assistant with 16+ years experience working with corporations, law firms, and large and small businesses in all aspects of business
development and support.Â Seeking a professional administrative position in a dynamic, professional, educational, or corporate environment.
Â Excellent written and oral communication skills.
Highlights
Proficient in Microsoft Office
Requires little or no training
Excellent Internet Research Skills
Independent worker and Team Member
Detailed and Accurate Transcription Abilities
Self-motivating
Public Speaking and Leadership Skills
Creative and Positive
Professional Image
Experience with Social Media Sites and Maintenance
Effective Decision Maker
Accomplishments
Set department standards by exceeding company daily goals. Â
Trained new team members on how to reach their full potential and company expectations.Â
